Name: sprint_capacity_limit
Description: The total story points of user stories in a sprint must not exceed the team's velocity.

Name: project_budget_limit
Description: The total cost of the project must not exceed its allocated budget.

Name: team_size_minimum
Description: A development team must have a minimum number of members to be effective (e.g.

Name: team_size_maximum
Description: A development team should not exceed a maximum size to maintain agility (e.g.

Name: worker_availability
Description: An assigned worker must have an availability status that is not 'on leave'.

Name: sprint_duration_fixed
Description: The duration between the start and end date of a sprint must be fixed (e.g.

Name: must_have_product_owner
Description: A team must be assigned exactly one Product Owner.

Name: must_have_scrum_master
Description: A team must be assigned exactly one Scrum Master.

Name: epic_must_be_decomposed
Description: An Epic cannot be moved to a sprint; it must first be broken down into User Stories.

Name: task_blocked_status
Description: A task with an active Blocker cannot have the status 'Done'.

Name: feature_priority_required
Description: A feature must have a priority assigned to be considered for the backlog.

Name: user_story_has_acceptance_criteria
Description: A user story cannot be planned in a sprint without defined acceptance criteria.
